channel.title: Qt on Jeff Smith
channel.link:
http://localhost:3000/tags/qt/Recent content in Qt on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usSat, 14 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000
You need to install XCode 5.0.0http://localhost:3000/notes/you-need-to-install-xcode-5.0.0/Sat, 14 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/you-need-to-install-xcode-5.0.0/Run… sudo /usr/bin/xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer From: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31554125/attempt-to-install-qt-on-os-x-gives-you-need-to-install-xcode-5-0-0-but-this
Jetbrains toolbox opens to blank windowhttp://localhost:3000/notes/jetbrains-toolbox-opens-to-blank-window/Mon, 18 Sep 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/jetbrains-toolbox-opens-to-blank-window/Launch with arg: --disable-seccomp-filter-sandbox From: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/359236/jetbrains-toolbox-loads-to-a-blank-screen
Rebuild kde5 application menuhttp://localhost:3000/notes/rebuild-kde5-application-menu/Tue, 12 Jul 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/rebuild-kde5-application-menu/Sometimes KDE likes to remember apps that have been moved or removed. Run this to refresh: kbuildsycoca5
Qt get screen size and set window locationhttp://localhost:3000/notes/qt-get-screen-size-and-set-window-location/Mon, 06 Jun 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/qt-get-screen-size-and-set-window-location/WidgetMainWindow w; QRect rec = QApplication::desktop()->screenGeometry(); int height = rec.height(); int width = rec.width(); w.setGeometry(width - 450, 10, 450, 700); w.show();
